name: ProspectPro Production
description: Lead generation platform with zero mock data - requires Supabase database and real API keys

NODE_ENV.description: Node environment - MUST be 'production' for Railway

PORT.description: Server port - Railway auto-configures this, do not override

SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY.description: Supabase service role key (keep secret!) - REQUIRED

SUPABASE_ANON_KEY.description: Supabase anonymous/public key from Settings > API - REQUIRED

GOOGLE_PLACES_API_KEY.description: Google Cloud Console Places API key - REQUIRED for business discovery

SCRAPINGDOG_API_KEY.description: ScrapingDog API key for website scraping - Optional but recommended

HUNTER_IO_API_KEY.description: Hunter.io API key for email discovery - Optional but recommended

NEVERBOUNCE_API_KEY.description: NeverBounce API key for email validation - Optional but recommended

PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: 32-character hex token for API security: node -e "console.log(require('crypto').randomBytes(32).toString('hex'))"

PERSONAL_USER_ID.description: Your unique user identifier for campaign attribution

PERSONAL_EMAIL.description: Your email address for system notifications
